AppenderInfo.AppenderDesc: This appender will send events to a RemoteAddress on the specified RemotePort.

Argument.Name: LocalPort
Argument.Description: The specified port number for local to send log message.

Argument.Name: RemoteAddress
Argument.Description: The specified IP address to receive log message.

Argument.Name: RemotePort
Argument.Description: The specified port number for remote to receive log message.
